page.title: 15LEISURE IN SWINDON
page.content: There are two major leisure centres in Swindon: the{Oasis}and the {Link.}The Oasis, situated near central Swindon, was opened in 1976. The Link Centre is in Western Swindon and was opened in 1985; its opening was one of this year's major local events. The facilities provided at the two leisure centres were decided upon only after careful market research; e.g. only two squash courts were built at the Link Centre because it was thought that the sport is slowly losing popularity. Although both centres have many similar facilities the Link includes an{ice rink}(which it is hoped will attract people from a 60 mile radius) and a rock climbing and traversing wall. The swimming pool at the Oasis is for leisure only whilst the pool at the Link can be used for competitive swimming. The Link also has a library.
